title: Aaron Carter kisses mum Jane on lips as they hit swanky red carpet
text:
Aaron Carter kissed mum Jane on a red carpet (Picture: Getty)

Aaron Carter kissed his mum on the lips as they hit up the WE’s Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition premiere.

The 31-year-old was joined by Jane for the party, at the swanky Mondrian Hotel in LA, on Thursday.

And he proved just how much he appreciated his mum as he planted a kiss on her lips.

Nick Carter’s brother looked healthy at the bash, rocking a black and white gingham blazer, coupled with a black shirt, tie and trousers.

While Jane opted for a navy blue silk dress for her appearance.

The singer shared a glimpse of himself getting ready on Instagram, branding their evening a ‘date night’.

Aaron Carter pecked his mum on the lips at the bash (Picture: Getty)

They appeared at the premiere of Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition (Picture: Getty)

Alongside a snap of himself looking suited and booted, he told his 482k followers: ‘#Lesson 3 Today. How to tie a single Windsor Knot…..

Advertisement

‘I’m going to my first prom tonight. Date Night With My Mom. #Joker.’

The pair have always had a close bond, and Aaron recently gave his mum a shout-out for completing 40 days sober, after facing addiction issues.

‘My mother sent me a picture updating me on her progress and I’m so proud that she is almost 40 days sober and she is truly the love of my life,’ he captioned a photo of Jane smiling widely in a sun hat.

Jane recently celebrated 40 days of being sober (Picture: Getty)

Nick Carter recently welcomed his second child with wife Lauren (Picture: WireImage)

‘Mumma without you there would be no me. It was sad that some of my family decided to cut her off due to the disease of addiction.

‘Something the rest of my family isn’t as knowledgeable about more than me, because I’ve been to rehab twice and I’m finally at a place where I can be there for my mother and I got her the help she needed through @thedoctorstv.

‘They changed my life and my mother is the reason why I have what I have and I want all of you to know that you should never forget who introduced you to me and it was most likely allllllll the mumma bears out there.

‘#iloveyoumum #sobriety you can do it and you CAN help the ones you love as long as you help yourselves first. #LMG (sic).’

Advertisement

Aaron has had a rough ride of late and caused concern when he accused his late sister Leslie, who died in 2012, of rape.

His older brother also Nick Carter requested a restraining order against him, accusing his sibling of threatening to kill his pregnant wife, Lauren, and their unborn baby.

Aaron seemed to apologise to the Backstreet Boys singer on Twitter after Lauren gave birth.

The star, who recently announced his move to Canada, also revealed he’s seeking help for his mental health and is now receiving treatment.
